fields.title: Settlers of Catan
fields.description: Players take on the roles of settlers, each attempting to build and develop holdings while trading and acquiring resources. Players gain points as their settlements grow; the first to reach a set number of points, typically 10, wins.

fields.title: Codenames
fields.description: Two teams compete by each having a spymaster give one-word clues that can point to multiple words on the board. The other players on the team attempt to guess their team's words while avoiding the words of the other team.

fields.title: Cards Against Humanity
fields.description: An adult party game in which players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using words or phrases typically deemed offensive, risqué or politically incorrect printed on playing cards.
fields.designer: Daniel Dranove, David Pinsof, and Eliot Weinstein
